column2: "Partner! Over here!"
"Sorry to drag you out here, but I just didn't know how to explain it..."
"Just take a look for yourself. You'll see what I mean."
"...He got you involved too? Way to keep this private..."
"Aw, come on...!"

"Oh, who do we have here, a guest?
You came out here because you
wanted to meet me, right?"
"Ah, you must be <%me>."
"Greetings, my name is Aurora. It's a pleasure to meet you."
"I suppose that name doesn't mean much to you, does it?"
"Let me see, how could I explain in a way that you would understand..."
"I am the first host of [Apprentice]. The original Apprentice. Does that make sense to you?"
"Ouch! What was that for, you meanie?"
"Don't go giving yourself grand titles like \"the original Apprentice\" when you don't even remember anything from when you were [Apprentice]."
"Hmph, like you'd know, meanie. You weren't even a complete host."
"...See why I couldn't explain now?"
"I was totally confused. Not even Lida could say what happened."
"This mouthy little kid just popped out of Lida and started calling herself Apprentice..."
"...Hey Afin, don't say \"popped out\" near me again. Just thinking about it again makes me..."
"How do you think I feel, meanie? If you weren't incomplete, I wouldn't be standing here looking like a child."
"Although, I suppose that in some odd way, this has granted my wish to preserve my youth."
"Let's be clear on this. I have no idea how or why I was brought back to life."
"All I know is that I've somehow become a part of Eu here. There's no way to separate us."
"...We'll see about that."
"Oh, don't be like that. I bet you're secretly happy to have someone you can share your worries with."

"These two don't know anything, and my own memories don't hold any answers.
...Can you help us?"
"Can you work out why I'm like this?"
"Why the dregs of my personality held within [Apprentice] might have coalesced into this half-formed body?"
"The effects of the [Profound Darkness] resurrecting?"
"The influence of the Corrupted Area on Lillipa?"
"Corrupted? What do you mean? Is it something to do with the [Profound Darkness]?"
"Has the [Profound Darkness] emerged again?"
"...What do you mean, \"again\"?"
"Exactly what I said, little Eu. I could say more, but that will depend on whether you can help me satisfy my curiosity."
"Give and take, yes? Or is that a foreign concept to you people?"
"Who died and made you queen?"
"Actually, I was called a Goddess in my previous life."
"Now that I'm back, however it happened, I'd like to explore this planet a bit."
"Who knows, little Eu. Maybe we'll even find a way to separate us."
"...Hmph. I'll hold you to that."
"Wait, Lida, we need to tell Xiao...!"
"Partner, can you report this for us? Sorry to leave you with this."
"Hey, Lida, wait up!"
